```{r}

data <- read.csv("clean_data\\trackData.csv")

v = data %>% group_by(song_name,artist_name) %>% summarise(avg_rank = mean(ranking), weeks_trending = n()) %>% mutate(avg_rank_per_week = avg_rank/weeks_trending) %>% arrange(avg_rank_per_week)
View(v)

songs_selected <- v %>% filter(avg_rank < 20,weeks_trending > 2)
View(songs_selected)
```
